verses.verse: {A Davidic Song of Ascents} {Up to Jerusalem} d I rejoiced when they kept on asking me, "Let us go to the Lord's Temple."
Our feet are standing inside your gates, Jerusalem.
Jerusalem stands built up, a city knitted together.
To it the tribes ascend the tribes of the Lord as decreed to Israel, to give thanks to the name of the Lord .
For thrones are established there for judgment, thrones of the house of David.
Pray for peace for Jerusalem: "May those who love you be at peace! {Or you prosper}
May peace be within your ramparts, and {So LXX Syr DSS 11QPs a ; the Heb. lacks and} prosperity {Or peacefulness ; LXX reads abundance} within your fortresses."
For the sake of my relatives and friends I will now say, "May there be peace within you."
For the sake of the Temple of the Lord our God, I will seek your welfare.
